目前最新稳定的破解版本：9.0.2

1. 从官网下载安装主程序，安装完之后先不要运行；
* [Geneious 9.0.2 for Windows 32-bit](https://assets.geneious.com/installers/geneious/release/Geneious_windows_9_0_2_with_jre.exe)
* [Geneious 9.0.2 for Windows 32-bit MSI](https://assets.geneious.com/installers/geneious/release/Geneious_windows_9_0_2_with_jre.msi)
* [Geneious 9.0.2 for Windows 64-bit](https://assets.geneious.com/installers/geneious/release/Geneious_win64_9_0_2_with_jre.exe)
* [Geneious 9.0.2 for Windows 64-bit MSI](https://assets.geneious.com/installers/geneious/release/Geneious_win64_9_0_2_with_jre.msi)
* [Geneious 9.0.2 for Mac OS 10.6](https://assets.geneious.com/installers/geneious/release/Geneious_mac64_9_0_2.dmg)
* [Geneious 9.0.2 for Mac OS 10.7+](https://assets.geneious.com/installers/geneious/release/Geneious_mac64_9_0_2_with_jre.dmg)
* [Geneious 9.0.2 for Linux](https://assets.geneious.com/installers/geneious/release/Geneious_unix_9_0_2_with_jre.sh)
* [Geneious 9.0.2 for Linux 64-bit](https://assets.geneious.com/installers/geneious/release/Geneious_linux64_9_0_2_with_jre.sh)
```sh
#Windows直接双击运行
#Linux运行下面的命令：
cd 安装文件所在的目录
chmod +x Geneious_linux64_9_0_2_with_jre.sh
./Geneious_linux64_9_0_2_with_jre.sh
```

2. 将iSeek.jar文件复制替换安装目标文件夹底下的同名文件（通常Windows默认安装位置为C:\Program Files\Geneious）；

[下载地址(8687)](https://url23.ctfile.com/f/24032223-893748345-1f34bd?p=8687)
[备用链接](https://mntext.lanzoul.com/iplvC139651g)
[百度网盘](https://pan.baidu.com/s/10DWIXH3Bhv0P3VsZr-7GrA?pwd=v8fd)

3. 打开主程序，根据提示信息，输入下方注册信息。
```
用户名：myrmecia
序列号：;;
```

然后就可以使用啦！
